snippet: FRIEND--Charlotte Goldstein on April 5, 2016 at 99. Ardent zionist, eyshet chayil. A life dedicated to tikkun olam. Survived by daughters Ellen Heyman (Barry), Beth Friend (Richard Heinrich), four grandsons, and a great- granddaughter. Z"L. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEND--Charlotte Goldstein on April 5, 2016 at 99. Ardent zionist, eyshet chayil. A life dedicated to tikkun olam. Survived by daughters Ellen Heyman (Barry), Beth Friend (Richard Heinrich), four grandsons, and a great- granddaughter. Z"L. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRIEND, CHARLOTTE GOLDSTEIN ON APRIL 5
